metadata.title: Putting Feelings Into a Moment, Part 1

tracks.text: Silhouettes of Towa, Kei, Rakuro and Rei stand in front of portraits of their SLF characters Pencilgon, Oikatzo, Sunraku, and Psyger-0.
Text, Original Work, Katarina, Ryosuke Fuji. Serialized by Kodansha in Weekly Shounen Magazine
Rakuro wears a VR headset. A diamond shaped pendant swings in darkness.
A western style town stands at the foot of a hill with a castle at the top.
The sun sets and day turns to night.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro turns into Sunraku, who wields twin marsh daggers
Red water gurgles
Pencilgon descends to the ground and strikes with a spear
Katzo draws a red fist and black fist together, and her fists burst crimson.
Emul, Elke, Vash, Bilac, and Peitz walk along the Rabbituza palace verandah.
Psyger-0 and Psyger-100 stand back to back in a board room
Setsuna walks. Beyond her is the gnarled tree, high cliffs, and full moon.
A samurai covered in metal stares at us with glowing eyes. Fire licks his arms, shoulders, and stomach.
A metal horse rears in front of a red moon
A golden scale shifts
Sunraku holds a two handed long sword and strikes at shadowy ghouls that surround him in a misty, purple forest.
Dozens of shadowy figures stand on outcroppings. Their eyes glow red.
Pencilgon swings a spear in mist
A headless horse and horseman gallop. She strikes
Katzo does a flying back flip over skeletal monsters
The samurai draws a sword. The moon reflects in a muddy puddle. A drop splashes. Psyger-0 holds a sword, her long red plume blowing in the wind.
In a library, a girl with long pink braids and wide, green eyes smiles widely and reaches out a hand.
An orb lands on Sunraku's abs and glows
Sunraku grips a curved dagger. Wearing a beetle helmet and diamond shaped pendant, he runs forward. Katzo with red fists and Pencilgon with a spear run with him.
In slow motion, they approach the samurai. The world turns red.
Text, 15, Putting feelings into a moment, Part 1
A field of poppies
2 figures walk hand in hand. One is Setsuna.
Setsuna speaks.
Our view if fuzzy
The other figure hold Setsuna
Fade to white
Pencilgon leaves a store, carrying a bag and smiling.
Members of the Knights Tempura clan enter
Psyger-0 paces in a hotel room
In bed, Rei blushes and pants, grasping a hand written letter
Dialog, Psyger-0-san will send Sunraku-san this mailbird. Confirm?
Her finger hovers over the button
She pulls back.
The falcon holds a letter and watches. Rei closes her eyes, opens them, and stares forward. Psyger-0 stands.
She presses the button
The falcon flies away
A falcon enters the room.
Sunraku and Emul kneel on pillows on the Rabituza Palace verandah. They drink matcha green tea from yunomi tea cups, decorated with the word rabbit
A falcon approaches
It lands on his head. Mail bird dialog.
A falcon descends
She hits his face while he laughs
A diamond shaped pendant
Equipped, ID Shard Necklace
Emul jumps down and hugs Sunraku
Rakuro's house, at night
Eika walks up the stairs, drying her long black hair.
She sees a sign. Important business until tomorrow morning. Stay out!
She sighs and smiles. Rakuro lies on his bed, wearing VR goggles
Cans of Energy Kaiser and Riot Blood lie on the desk.
Thirdrema at night
Sunraku opens his eyes.
He wears the ID Shard Necklace
Emul sits on the roof of the palace, looking up at the sky.
Outcroppings stretch over the narrow inlet. A light glows from inside a ship. Pencilgon watches from a distance.
Text, Ashura Kai's Hideout
Around 20 players gather on the ship deck, all with skull icons.
Orcelot taps his foot and watch.
Psyger-0 descends, cutting a player in half.
Psyger-100 stands on an outcropping.
Several clans raise flags
The inlet is surrounded on all sides
A player attacks. Psyger-0 swings, killing 2 players.
Orcelot equips a sword as dozens of players descend.
Orcelot kills a player.
Orcelot and 4 others run into a cave.
Red petals drift in the air around the barren, gnarled tree
She sends a party invite and they accept
Orcelot + 4 runs through the forest grotto
No Entry, Other players are fighting this unique monster.
She looks at the others, who nod
She places her hand on a black crack in the tree, which grows to the size of a door
The trio stare with determination.
They step through
In a flash of light, they step out into a gray land. Cliffs surround them on all sides. The night sky appears light and the moon glows dark, a photo negative of a full moon at night.
Pink, sakura cherry blossom petals float around
They stand in the barren field, with a blooming sakura tree in the center.
Into the gap between moments spills a single wish
Wind blows petals into their face.
A samurai kneels in front of a grave stone.
The large, healthy tree has long branches, covered in sakura blossoms. The petals fall like soft rain over the gravestone, the kneeling samurai, and his sword
The sword his a red sheath. The hilt of the sword has a glowing blue line along its edge.
The metal samurai kneels in seiza on the earth, sitting on his heels. He rests his hands on his thighs.
The trio's levels drop to 50
The trio look at each other and nod
A sakura blossom drifts down to the sword. It lands on the hilt. Wethermon picks up his sword, and the sakura falls away
Wethermon's eyes glow blue. He slowly stands.
Sunraku stretches, rotating his shoulder.
Wethermon holds his hilt at his side, and takes up a stance for quick draw.
Sunraku approaches.
A sakura blossom falls
and is cut in half
Sunraku drops below the wind.
He kicks Wethermon's right leg. The legs end in metal stakes without feet.
Wethermon slowly looks down.
He casts the hilt aside and swings his sword down with 2 hands. Sunraku dodges.
Equips empire bee twin blades
Strike strike strike kick strike. Wethermon parries and deflects with minimal movements.
Sunraku flies back, then runs forward. Wethermon strikes, Sunraku dodges up, twists in the air and strikes. Wethermon parries, knocking Sunraku back.

He backflips and crouches. Wethermon holds his sword high then swings it straight down. Sunraku runs past Wethermon, who turns to follow. Sunraku runs a lap around Wethermon then strikes. Wethermon parries.
Wethermon holds his sword high then swings it straight down. Sunraku dodges, spinning in the air, and recovers. He strikes again. Wethermon parries.
Sunraku dodges a horizontal slash while slashing Wethermon's waist
Pencilgon pulls out an item, Reward Scales.
She holds the scales, such that Sunraku and Wethermon are above each pan
He kicks Wethermon's knee
Wethermon takes a quickdraw stance. Katzo stops tapping her fingers.
A sword strikes through Sunraku's abs. His eyes widen. Katzo grits her teeth. Pencilgon's eyes widen.
Sunraku's HP drops to 0
Rebirth Tearjewel
She throws the orb like a baseball at Sunraku's disappearing form.
It bounces off Sunraku's body, and orbiting symbols of ancient language expand around him.
Sunraku opens his eyes.
Sunraku stares away from us.
Rakuro passes through Sunraku's outline.
Sunraku stands with scars over his arms, back, and torso. Emul holds onto his neck by her ears.
Rei rests her head in her hand, eyes closed.
Katzo sits on the ground, resting her arm ona  raised knee.
Pencilgon's purple hair flows in the wind. She rests a hand over her heart.
Setsuna hold her hands behind her pack. She stares forward, her hair blowing in the wind.
Setsuna turns to look at us.
Pencilgon, Sunraku, and Katzo walk together through a field
Fade to white
Text, 20, Celebrity Towa Amane is a Gamer?
Pencilgon walks down the street.
